--- alter_table_alter_column_drop_default.sql
alter table foo alter column foo drop default
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AlterColumn{
    Alter: 16,
    Name:  &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 29,
      NameEnd: 32,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
    Alteration: &ast.AlterColumnDropDefault{
      Drop:    33,
      Default: 38,
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ALTER COLUMN foo DROP DEFAULT
